doc.title: Mr. Bean Rides Again
doc.plot: Another crazy day in the life of Mr. Bean. Today, car trouble forces Mr. Bean to take the bus. At the bus stop, a man has a heart attack and Mr. Bean tries to revive him, including a method involving jumper cables. Then Mr. Bean tries to mail a letter, while swallowing the stamp and getting stuck in the mail box in the process, then tries to make things fit into a small suit case, then takes a hilarious train ride with a man who won't stop laughing, and finally rides on an airplane and tries to cheer up a nauseas passenger.
